item.title: Wordpress Password Hash Generator
item.description: This plugin simply generates the wordpress hash password and user password update sql query. Clone the repository 1 git clone git@github.com:sachinkiranti/wp-password-hash-generator.git Activate it! Usage Add the shortcode to wordpress POST/PAGE or anywhere you want to :
